rules_text:
Hexproof from instants
Whenever Chieko, Untamed Rover attacks, you may [b][cast target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard with mana value X or less[/b] [b]without paying it's mana cost][/b], where X is its power.
Flash paradigm {X}{U}{B} [i](You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for its paradigm cost.)[/i]
